agilermi.core

Class RmiRegistry.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • agilermi.core.RmiRegistry.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    RmiRegistry

    public static class RmiRegistry.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder for RmiRegistry. A new instance of this class can be returned by the RmiRegistry.builder() static method. A new instance of this class wraps all the defaults for RmiRegistry and allows to modify them. When the configuration has been terminated, a new RmiRegistry instance can be obtained by the build() method. defaults:
    • connection listener enabled: false
    • connection listener port: 0 (a random port)
    • connection listener daemon: true
    • ServerSocketFactory: null (that is ServerSocketFactory.getDefault())
    • SocketFactory: null (that is SocketFactory.getDefault())
    • ProtocolEndpointFactory: null
    • Authenticator: null
    • authentication Identifier: null (that is guest identifier)
    • authentication pass-phrase: null (that is guest pass-phrase)
    Author:
    Salvatore Giampa'

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RmiRegistry build()
      Builds the RmiRegistry.
      RmiRegistry.Builder setAuthenticator(Authenticator authenticator)
      Set an Authenticator object that intercept authentication and authorization requests from remote machines.
      RmiRegistry.Builder setProtocolEndpointFactory(ProtocolEndpointFactory protocolEndpointFactory)
      Sets the ProtocolEndpointFactory instance to use in the registry to build.
      RmiRegistry.Builder setSocketFactories(javax.net.SocketFactory socketFactory, javax.net.ServerSocketFactory serverSocketFactory)
      Sets the socket factories that the registry will use.

        Parameters:
